Title: Bharti Airtel Share Price Today, February 10: Stocks of Bharti Airtel Limited Rise by INR 16.70 in Early Trade
Description: According to the latest trading updates on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), Bharti Airtel Limited (NSE: BHARTIARTL) shares were trading at INR 1,693.45 and grew by INR 16.70 or 1 per cent.

Title: Share Market Highlights 6 February 2025: Markets extend losses ahead of RBI rate decision; Sensex falls 213 pts to close at 78,058, Nifty ends at 23,603
Description: Sensex, Nifty updates on 6 February 2025: Benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty slid for the second consecutive day on Thursday amid caution ahead of the RBI’s monetary policy decision and fresh foreign fund outflows. The 30-share BSE Sensex dropped 213.12 point…
